## TileDataSource.setTheme() method

Apply the \[\[Theme\]\] to this data source.

Applies new \[\[StyleSet\]\] and definitions from theme only if matching styleset (see `styleSetName` property) is found in `theme`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
/** @override */
setTheme(theme: Theme, languages?: string[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  theme | [Theme](./harp-datasource-protocol.theme.md) |  |
|  languages | string\[\] |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
